channel.title: 'javac is not a valid command'
channel.description: I am haveing alot of trubel with just even starting the sources that i down loaded. i read that i need the jdk 6 update 2 run time invirment to run the servers and compile them, so i got it. I know that it works becuse i down loaded "frugoo scape's prive server control panel" that only works in jdk6. i went into the c\progam files\java\bin and found javac.java. its there... it works... but the servers wont run and they wont compile... moparscape runs fine so does runescape and frugoo scape... i keep getting the error that u getn when u have an old version of the java. could there be some other problem?

item.title: 'javac is not a valid command'
item.dc:creator: @Punkd Punkd
item.description:
@Punkd wrote:

i had this problem too but i got it fixed. You have to edit the .bat file that connects to the file from the “compiler” file like this

@echo off title WhiteScape Compiler cd C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_12\bin javac C:\WhiteScape\*.java pause

You have to change the Jdk “jdk1.5.0_12” version with the version that you have so if your using JDK 6 update 2 You should change it jre1.6.0_02

I hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: 'javac is not a valid command'

item.description:
